attributes.action: Letting disability scooters on trains and buses
attributes.additional_details: After some arguments I was aloud to travel but told my partner had to lift my scooter on and of with no help this needs to change as more and more people use scooters
attributes.background: Traveling from York to blackpool with my mobility scooter booked tickets and the ramp in advance told them it was a scooter was fine till blackpool was greeted an told I wasn't aloud to travel with my scooter and may have trouble going bk I did I was rudely approached by staff saying I can't travel
